source_published_at.description: Date on which the publishing entity made the Consultation available for view to the target audience, on its own platform

source_reference_id.description: Unique id assigned to each Consultation, on publishing entity's platform

extension_count.description: The number of times the deadline of a Consultation has been extended by the Organisation, while the Consultation is live; consequently reflected on Civis portal

time_taken.description: Time taken in seconds, by human actor to prepare the Consultation summary

multimedia_explainer_file_id.description: Multimedia content accompanying text synopsis of Consultation

language_id.description: Language in which Consultation synopsis has been worded, on Civis' platform, must be the ID of a master reference data language

original_url.description: Link to the website page on which the consultation document had been originally published by the Organisation

name.description: Text carrying the full name of the organisation, in English

allOf.description: Type of the entity, if it is an individual or an organisation and also if it is a Government affiliated one or not
The jurisdiction of Government that the Consultation has originated from. For Consultations not published by the Government, the category would be 'other'

ReferenceDataType.description:
Reference data type:
  * `domain` - The sector to which an entity is related to E.g: Environment/Urban Settlements
  * `organisation_type` - The constitution of the entity, as a Government affiliation or a non-government capacity
  * `signup_mode` - Online channel preferred by Civisen for creating an account on Civis; to be chosen between 3 options - Google/Facebook/Form filling
  * `language` - Indian regional language of summary
  * `social_media_channel` - Social media channel on which the Consultation has been shared (Facebook/Whatsapp/Twitter/LinkedIn)
  * `publishing_medium` - The channel(s) through which a Consultation is made available for view to the target audience and scanned by Civis for discovering Consultations. This could be a single or multiple channels.

SummaryType.description:
Summary type:
  * `primary` - This is the primary summary created in the primary language of English based on which other summaries are created out of.
  * `translation` - This is a translated version of the primary summary.

Error.description:
In case of any failure during processing of the requests server is required to return the error object. It is recommended taht error codes are namespaced error codes taht can provide contexual information about the error just by examining the code, e.g. origin.badlocation.
In case debug is permitted for a certain role, api client has indicated the need to get the debug information during the call and server is configured to honor the debug information request - it is recommended that highly detailed ifnormation about the problem (along with complete stack trace) is provided to the api client.

Id.description: Record ID for the intended operation

ConsultationSummarySearch.description: Search consultation summary using combination of parameters. If multiple parameter values are provided they will be treated as an 'and' condition for the search

File.description: Manages the upload, storage and deletion of the files.

FileUpdate.description: Manages the upload, storage and deletion of the files.
